glsa.title: acpid: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: An error in acpid might allow remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service.

background.p: acpid is a daemon for the Advanced Configuration and Power Interface (ACPI).

description.p: The acpid daemon allows opening a large number of UNIX sockets without closing them, triggering an infinite loop.

impact.p: Remote attackers can cause a Denial of Service (CPU consumption and connectivity loss).

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All acpid users should upgrade to the latest version:
